scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: pnpm --filter frontend test:unit && pnpm --filter backend test:unit
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.db:migrate:test: dotenv -e .env.test pnpm --filter backend prisma migrate deploy
